high sensitivity: The high sensitivity of ISO 1000 lets you capture crisp, blur-free images at high shutter speeds, or under conditions with low light.
mpeg: The MPEGMOVIE VX feature lets you shoot exciting video clips in full VGA resolution. The recording duration is limited only by the size of your memory card.
noise reduction: Sony's clear RAW NR (noise reduction) algorithm suppresses noise within the RAW file to give clear, natural images. This technology is especially effective when shooting at high ISO settings.
